title: Why do you love Kinesis?
content:
Not that I don't like Mr. Jamra's interesting serif, I'm just wondering what makes it stand out from the crowd. I've noticed that this particular face is held in high regard around here.

Thanks,

Christian.
author: _Palatine_

comments.content:
Huh. Who besides me loves it?

I love it because it's expressive without being mushy, it's narrow, and most of all it's got cojones de latón - nothing like the bulk of Adobe fonts.

hhp
I like it very much. I wish someone had the balls to use it as a text face.
Count me in. I wish _i_ had the balls, or the appropriate job, to use it as a text face.
I like Kinesis a great deal as well.
